description: Detects suspicious new RUN key element pointing to an executable in a suspicious folder
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Markus Neis
Sander Wiebing
false_positives: Software using weird folders for updates
name: New RUN Key Pointing to Suspicious Folder
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Rr][Uu][Nn]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Rr][Uu][Nn][Oo][Nn][Cc][Ee]\\.*/) AND ((winlog.event_data.Details:(/.*[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*[Cc]\:\\\$[Rr][Ee][Cc][Yy][Cc][Ll][Ee]\.[Bb][Ii][Nn]\\.*/ OR /.*[Cc]\:\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/ OR /.*[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\\.*/ OR /.*[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Dd][Ee][Ss][Kk][Tt][Oo][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\%[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\%\\.*/ OR /.*\%[Tt][Mm][Pp]\%\\.*/)) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:(/\%[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\%\\.*/ OR wscript* OR cscript*))))
